name: The wait should't be much longer
name_original: The wait should't be much longer
description:
WARNING

This is a joke game, don't take it seriously!

PLOT

You're just pirated Baldi's basics plus and regretted it, you got into an unknown room with Mystman, he's very angry at you and you better not get in his eyes, in order to get out you need to collect the mystmenium, and open the big door, but beware of Mystman, good luck!

CONTROLS

WASD - Walk

Shift - Sprint

LMB (Left Mouse Button)  - Collect
